attributes.action: MotoGP Races should continue to be available live on free to view channels
attributes.additional_details: I the undersigned request intervention to ensure the continued coverage of live MotoGP racing on free to view channels.

rejection.details:
There is an e-petition asking the Government to examine the question of what sporting event is and isn't on terrestrial television.

Specific examples aren't in the Government's powers - that's for the broadcasters.
